title: ALL SHALL PERISH Announces West Coast Tour
description: It's time for deathcore. The post ALL SHALL PERISH Announces West Coast Tour appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 3 hours ago
text: The recently-reunited All Shall Perish – currently vocalist Eddie Hermida, guitarists Chris Storey and Ben Orum, and drummer Matt Kuykendall – has just announced a whole West Coast tour after their performance on October 2 at the Aftershock Festival in Sacramento, CA. For those out of the loop, All Shall Perish reunited in 2024 for two shows at Inkcarceration 2024 and Big Texas Metal Fest 2024. The tour comes about one month prior to All Shall Perish's first European tour since 2013, so yeah – All Shall Perish is back in a pretty big way! Openers for the West Coast dates have yet to be announced. Tickets are available here. 10/2 Sacramento, CA Aftershock10/3 Portland, OR Nova PDX10/4 Seattle, WA El Corazon10/5 Spokane, WA The Big Dipper10/7 Salt Lake City, UT Soundwell10/8 Denver, CO The Oriental Theater10/9 Albuquerque, NM Sunshine Theater10/10 Mesa, AZ Nile10/11 Las Vegas, NV 24 Oxford w/ Peeling Flesh, Vulvodynia, Acranius & Necrotted 11/21 Germany Berlin Hole 4411/22 Germany Bochum Matrix11/23 Netherlands Tilburg 01311/24 France Paris Glazart11/25 UK London O2 Islington Academy11/26 UK Glasgow Slay11/28 UK Leeds Stylus11/29 UK Birmingham Asylum11/30 Belgium St Niklas De Casino12/2 Germany München Backstage12/3 Italy Milan Legend Club12/4 Germany Frankfurt Das Bett12/5 Austria Wien Arena12/6 Germany Leipzig Felsenkeller12/7 Czech Republic Prague Rock Cafe12/8 Poland Warsaw Proxima12/10 Gernmany Hamburg Knust12/11 Germany Hannover Musik Zentrum12/12 Switzerland Aarau Kiff12/13 Germany Stuttgartt Im Wizemann Want More Metal? html:
The recently-reunited All Shall Perish – currently vocalist Eddie Hermida, guitarists Chris Storey and Ben Orum, and drummer Matt Kuykendall – has just announced a whole West Coast tour after their performance on October 2 at the Aftershock Festival in Sacramento, CA. For those out of the loop, All Shall Perish reunited in 2024 for two shows at Inkcarceration 2024 and Big Texas Metal Fest 2024.

The tour comes about one month prior to All Shall Perish's first European tour since 2013, so yeah – All Shall Perish is back in a pretty big way! Openers for the West Coast dates have yet to be announced. Tickets are available here.
